description.part1: Is great for playing games and chilling with friends, or even building a worldwide community.

overview.title: Overview
overview.subtitle: Is a new way to communicate with your team.
overview.description: It's faster, better organized, better for WFH.

workstation.title: Workstation
workstation.description: A digital workspace that streamlines communication, collaboration, and task management by integrating with various systems and tools. It provides structured spaces for teams, projects, and departments while ensuring seamless access to information and workflows.

ecosystem.title: Ecosystem
ecosystem.description: A dynamic digital environment that combines work and social elements, offering interactive and recreational features. It supports virtual transactions, engagement activities, and community-building to enhance user experience.

aiAgent.title: AI Agent
aiAgent.description: An intelligent system that automates tasks, assists with information management, and optimizes workflows. It enhances productivity through features like reminders, monitoring, and automated communication.

textChannel.description: Built For Chat, Collaboration, And Connection.
textChannel.description2: Super-Fast Messaging. Zero Limits. Instant Delivery.

clanDiscover.title: Your Clan, Your World
clanDiscover.description: From hobbies and discussions to news and trends, there's a clan for everything.

aiAgent.title: AI Agents For Clan And Always-On Assistance
aiAgent.description: AI Agents for Clans and Always-On Assistance Voice AI Agent (summarizes voice channel conversations or acts as an interviewer), Assistant Mode, and Bot Shadow Mode (summarizes text channel content).

communityPayments.title: In-Community Payments
communityPayments.description: Send money instantly, reward creators, and shop with partner brands — all with zero platform fees. Built on transparency and security.

enterpriseIntegrations.title: Enterprise Integrations
enterpriseIntegrations.description: Mezon enables you to connect with customers globally and deliver captivating, large-scale experiences.

footer.description: Mezon is great for playing games and chilling with friends, or even building a worldwide community.
